post.body: Too funny. Last night Sconie and I ended up watching it on Disney without even realizing it. We wondered why Tink was so hip heavy.
Baby it's cold outside.
Note taken
nope. Mark would never have an excuse for at least not texting me to say he's not feeling well.
I am speechless.
You should "know". He should make it known that he only has eyes for you and that he is obviously not seeing anyone else.
Why?
Ditto here. Gotta love nap time.
Aw. Thank you. I got your message and I wont post the comment. :)
Was this a hubby offense? Gotta say it is a little Dorm Room style, when tacky was in.
Loved Leverage last night. The Mr and I agree that the show has crazy potential long as the writers keep up the story lines.
link for the article re memory loss and low carbs?
ohmygawd I love you
Fun trivia!
Anyone who wants a holiday card send me your address!
Went walking for an hour today with the wee one. Felt good to be outside. Might make it a regular habit.
Looking forward to seeing the pictures of the babe I took today with the fall leaves. It was GORGEOUS outside. Anyone want a free session?
Day one soda free. Morning is not going well. I'm two hours into the day and already twitching at the lack of artificial goodness.
Just got off the phone with a wedding client who is having Irish dancers at her reception. Dude. Ecstatic over here.
Waiting for her 7 pm phone call...
Law and Order. Craving me a caffeine infused bubbly beverage.
Lunch day two is lean pockets and steam-in-the-bag veggies. On top of a couple of regular Pepsi's. Eh, small steps right?
Trying out this animoto thing. Want to see what all the fuss is about. Will post final result on blog for all to see!
Shoved the kid into the shower so I could update my twitter.
Not sure this whole "trying to lose one pound" idea is taking hold as well as I'd like it too. Round one goes to McDonalds breakfast.
Uploading print orders and waiting for the babe to wake up so I can do some power cleaning.
Trying to lose one pound this week. If I can do it for a whole year I'll be 50 lbs lighter come next Thanksgiving. Fiber anyone?
Looking to start the week on the right foot. :-D
I am very certainly definitely most ready for nap time already. It's only 10:30 too. :(
Waiting for my oatmeal to be ready. Mmmmm.
Going to pick up my new business cards. So excited!
The babe continues to think I am his personal jungle gym for his morning workout routine.
Just posted an update on http://fitphotographers.com/
the kid needs another nap
Crap. I slipped up. Two dozen peanut MMs. Someone hand me a slimfast.
Okay. Another day soda free and making healthy choices. Starting with a good breakfast and nice cup of tea.
I had hopes of getting work done this morning without the babe in tow. Might need to rethink the plan now...
Grandmothers who dont show up when they say they will disappoint just as much as Fathers who don't show up.
My mouse is dying on me. Very sad. Dont want to get a new one. I'm attached to this one.
It is nap time. Now will someone tell the munchkins that please?
Burning dozens of CDs for client's digital files.
Really hoping to get some work done today and get back on track with the whole not over eating thing. Yeah. Also heading outside later.
Proofing my session from this afternoon and watching Borat with Sconie and my brother.
Went walking with Sconie and the kids for two hours. Came home and ate an XXL helping of high fat & calorie casserole. Damn my willpower.
Watching Leverage on TNT. It rocks.
I can't believe Lean pasta bowls are 5 WW points. I would have sworn they were 4. I want that damn point back please. Thankyouverymuch.
I need a shower. I stink. Ew.
I think I might be getting sick. No! Must not be sick. No No No.
Daily http://fitphotographers.com/ update - I'm still a sucker for fast food. Must learn to curb this bad habit.
Another Sneak Peek posted - http://www.sarahanne.net/
Thinking that everyone who replies to her is really just so awesome.
Oh I really want these mugs for the cousins - http://tinyurl.com/2naj9d They're so fun!
I just ordered these - http://tinyurl.com/5jqv2s Cant wait for them to get here!
I am DRAGGING this morning. Why? Why can I not be a chipper morning person? Life would be so much easier if I was.
Oh Hawt! Just posted a Boudoir sneak peek. http://tinyurl.com/6bgrns
Watching Dark Knight while editing from today's session. So hawt. Can't wait to blog it.
I'm breaking in the studio with my first shoot in it today. So excited to see how it turns out.
It's a new day with new choices and new to-do lists. Gotta love post-it notes.
Sugar cookies do, indeed, look like Christmas trees. Thank heavenly angels.
Maybe the sugar cookies will turn out like christmas trees instead of body parts.
They ate the peanut butter boobie cookies without complaint. Go figure.
The cookies looked like peanutbutter boobs. WHoops. Wonder if the kids will notice or just eat them. About to find out.
editing.
Today was totally straight from a romantic comedy, complete with farting kids and all.
Nap time is my favorite time of day. Followed by 5 pm. And then bedtime.
In stead of folding the three loads of laundry on the table or putting away the groceries, I'm working on a secret project for my mom.
Back from walking 2 miles with the babe. Showering, and then cookie making time. That and not telling anyone about my secret holiday gift.
It's Friday. I love Fridays. Anyone else?
Just received my first client boudoir book from Forbeyon and I'm in love. *heart*
More snow. more cold. i love a real michigan christmas.
Testing phone updates
It is stil Freezing!!!! My tush is really, really cold. Someone send me some longjohns!
Editing more boudoir.
Posted a Boudoir sneak peek. http://tinyurl.com/ayhq55
Okay, five degrees might be a little colder than I wanted for my White Christmas. I was thinking more like a mid 30s would be nice
Editing Noire Belle Boudoir images and listening to some rockin' music http://tinyurl.com/7yrxm7
Home after a day long Boudoir shoot. Love days like these.
ugh. stuffy nose.
Baby it's cold outside...
I'm home...in Michigan. It always feels like coming home. :)
Vote to save Small Businesses! http://tinyurl.com/6cj92v
Oh dear. Just had four pieces of pizza. Please tell me I did not just do that. *sigh* ;-)
Weight loss and lifestyle changes are so much easier when I tell the internets about them and force myself to follow through.
